name: Gopnik2D
description:
Gopnik2D is a funny Plattformer we are currently working on.
Progress is not very far yet but we are working on it.
We are looking for new ideas and improvements.
So if you have any cool fresh ideas or found a bug, leave it in the comments.

THIS IS ONLY A PROTOTYPE, NOT MUCH CONTENT.

Controls:

  • Arrowkeys + Enter for Menu
  • WSAD to move
  • 1,2 to change weapons
  • LMB to shoot
  • R to reset game
  • G for Grenades

Known bugs:

  • Turrets only explode when you are in range  FIXED
  • Cant jump when too close on wall
